description: Contains container/label information about a specimen received from an external lab system.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_CONTAINER
columns.description: The barcode for a container associated with the order's specimen.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_DESC
columns.description: Additional descriptive information about a container associated with the specimen.
